attributes.action: Ban all imported meat and only buy British
attributes.additional_details:
After everything that has happened recently why on earth do we the UK have to import meats?
Cheap meat bought by large supermarkets at inflate the price simply to make huge profits yet, sell second rate meats to our most vulnerable!
Stop importing meats from overseas and only insist on buying the best meat in the world UK meats.
This will also help out local farmers buy direct from them helping to surport all our businesses not foreign businesses!
